query:
INSERT INTO businessFrameworks (title, description, category, framework, steps, benefits, tierRequired, estimatedTimeSavings, difficulty) VALUES

('The 3-Step AI Activation Formula',
'A proven framework to go from identifying opportunities to implementing and scaling AI solutions in your business.',
'Implementation',
'The 3-Step AI Activation Formula helps you systematically identify quick-win opportunities, implement proven solutions, and scale results across your business. This framework is designed for business owners who want immediate, measurable results from AI adoption.',
'1. IDENTIFY: Find your quick-win opportunity - What task takes too much of your time? What work do you avoid because it''s tedious? Where do you need better results faster?

2. PROMPT: Copy, customize, and paste - Choose from proven prompt templates. Replace the [brackets] with your specific information. Paste into ChatGPT or your preferred AI tool.

3. PROFIT: Implement and scale your results - Start with one task and master it. Measure the time saved and quality improved. Expand to other areas of your business.',
'• Systematic approach to AI adoption
• Focus on high-impact, quick-win opportunities
• Measurable time and cost savings
• Scalable across multiple business functions
• No technical skills required',
'free',
'5-15 hours per week',
'beginner'),

('The Prompt Improvement Framework',
'A systematic approach to refining AI prompts for better, more consistent results.',
'Prompt Engineering',
'Transform vague prompts into precise instructions that deliver exactly what your business needs. This framework addresses the 5 most common prompt problems and provides actionable fixes.',
'1. TOO VAGUE → Add specific details
Example: "Write a blog post" → "Write a 600-word blog post about sustainable practices for Australian cafés"

2. POOR OUTPUT FORMAT → Specify exactly what you want
Example: "Create a marketing plan" → "Create a marketing plan with sections for budget, timeline, channels, and KPIs in a table format"

3. GENERIC CONTENT → Include your unique context
Example: "Draft an email to customers" → "Draft an email to customers who haven''t purchased in 3 months from our Brisbane-based organic skincare shop"

4. WRONG TONE → Define the voice
Example: "Write social media post" → "Write an Instagram caption with a casual, friendly tone that includes emojis and a question to encourage engagement"

5. MISSING EXPERTISE → Assign a relevant role
Example: "Give me advice on tax deductions" → "As an Australian small business tax expert, explain the top 5 deductions most local businesses miss"',
'• Consistently better AI outputs
• Reduced time spent on revisions
• More personalized, on-brand content
• Clearer communication with AI tools
• Reusable prompt templates',
'free',
'2-3 hours per week',
'intermediate'),

('The AI Integration Cycle',
'A continuous improvement process for integrating AI-generated content into your business workflow.',
'Workflow Optimization',
'Great prompts don''t happen by accident. This cycle helps you continuously improve your AI results through systematic planning, generation, review, and refinement.',
'1. WEEKLY CONTENT PLANNING
Identify business goals and content needs for the upcoming week.

2. DRAFT PROMPT WITH CONTENT BRIEF
Create detailed prompts with specific instructions about tone and format.

3. GENERATE CONTENT IN CHATGPT
Use your prompt to create the initial content draft.

4. REVIEW & PERSONALIZE
Add your unique voice and business perspective to stand out.

5. TRACK & REFINE
Measure engagement and adjust future prompts based on what works.

With each cycle, you''ll get better at writing prompts that deliver exactly what your business needs.',
'• Continuous improvement in AI outputs
• Data-driven prompt optimization
• Consistent brand voice across AI-generated content
• Measurable performance tracking
• Scalable content production',
'starter',
'3-5 hours per week',
'intermediate');
command:
